body:
Dear Sirs,

 

Good day to you, 

Looking for a cargo from Ukraine, POC (Ğ¡hornomorsk preferably)

Pls propose suitable cargoes for our HOME tonnage:

M/V "EILEEN" â€“ can do L/c 1-5 Sept. at Ğ¡hornomorsk port 

 

blt 1995 

dwcc 2900 mt on 5.93 summer draft

grain 4122 cbm / 145'572 cbft

 

M/V EILEEN

IMO NR    9070503   / CALL SIGN TJM0145

GENERAL CARGO SHIP    

FLAG CAMEROON / PORT OF REGISTER - KRIBI    

BUILD 1995 / ROMANIA - GALATÃ

CLASS VEGA REGISTER INC            

P&I CLUB RO Marine AS            

LOA / LBP  86.04 M / 80.12 M            

BREADTH MLD.     14.50 MTR            

DEPTH MLD. 6.713 MTR            

AIR DRAFT 28.70 MTR            

GROSS / NET TONNAGE    2598 / 1163             

DWCC 2900 MT ON 5.93M SUMMER DRAFT

HOLD 1: 25,88 X 12,40 X 8.0 M / HATCH 19.00 X 10.20 M

HOLD 2: 25,10 X 12,40 X 8.0 M / HATCH 19.00 X 10.20 M

TOTAL 4122 CBM / 145572.55CBF GRAIN

TOTAL 4038 CBM / 142606.01 CBF BALE

CONTAINERS CAP. 96  TEUS                

ADA WOG

 

I would like to inform you that MB NAVIGATION will soon operate under its new name â€” MARELIS NAVIGATION.

Kindly update your records with my new email address: chartering@marelis-nav.com

 

Kind Regards 

 

  Vladislav Datiy
  Brokerage Dpt.
  MB Navigation S.A. 
  Mobile: +30 697 255 0514  WhatsApp: +380 95 159 6113
  Teams: live:.cid.36a87362b7a2b27e
  E-mail: chartering@mbnav.com

It is essential that all messages in respect of operations be sent to the relevant email addresses (chartering@mbnav.com). We can accept no responsibility for delay or other consequences if messages are sent to any other email address within the company. Please ensure that all important operational messages are followed up with a telephone call especially after office hours, on week-end and holidays.
